definition: coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]

sentences.english: Small seashells have sometimes been used as a primitive kind of money.
sentences.chinese: 小貝殼有時用作簡單的錢幣。

sentences.english: The coin of natural patina, font dignified atmosphere, is perfectly preserved.
sentences.chinese: 該錢幣包漿自然，字體端莊大氣，品相保存完美。

sentences.english: How do I use this Change machine？
sentences.chinese: 這臺錢幣兌換機要怎麼用啊？

sentences.english: It is a crime to counterfeit money.
Yun-kun, I guess I've never thought of coins being the shape of a knife or a spade.
sentences.chinese: 我從來沒有想象到錢幣會有刀形和鏟形的。

sentences.english: For example, a "cent" in American money is from old French.
sentences.chinese: 例如，美國錢幣中“分”這個詞是來自於老法語。

sentences.english: Rarity enhances the worth of old coins.
My brother already many old coins.
sentences.chinese: 我哥哥已經收集了許多古錢幣。

sentences.english: I hope you picked up your coin?
sentences.chinese: 您該把您的那枚錢幣拾起來了吧？

sentences.english: High quality imitation Chinese coins, perfect for all of your routines .
sentences.chinese: 高質量仿製中國古錢幣，能用於你所有的魔術流程裏。

sentences.english: He posed as an expert on old coins.
sentences.chinese: 他假裝是個古錢幣專家。

sentences.english: A collection of ancient coins are buried behind his home garden.
sentences.chinese: 一批古錢幣被埋在他家後院。

sentences.english: Very few of these old coins survive.
sentences.chinese: 這些古錢幣現在已經十分罕見。

sentences.english: A colorful history of coins and currency from their very beginnings.
sentences.chinese: 一部圖文並茂的錢幣史，縱貫古今，精彩紛呈。

sentences.english: We saw a large amount of ancient coins in the museum.
sentences.chinese: 我們在這家博物館看到了大量的古錢幣。

sentences.english: All day, a steady stream of customers stop in to buy gold and silver bars and coins.
sentences.chinese: 這裏整天都有穩定的客流量前來購買金銀條和錢幣。

definition: material object/concrete object/original object/in kind/object for practical use/definite thing/reality/matter (physics)
handed down from ancient times/family heirloom
to cast (pour metal into a mold)
to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
